html:
9.16.19  6:43 am   Are you always answering questions

      no

9.16.19  6:37 am   Of all the music you have ever made, which song was your favorite?

      when making my music, instead of hearing something and deciding how much i like it, i am fortunate enough to have it go the other way. i think of how much i want to like it, and then i try to make the song match that

9.16.19  5:46 am  

















current sanity level? (please answer on a scale from 1 to 10)

      5

9.16.19  5:14 am   do you like bobbleheads

      none of them seem to bobble hard enough. i will search to the ends of the earth to get one that bobbles to my level of satisfaction

9.16.19  3:56 am   Why is my lyfe a joke seriously

      that is due to how serious it is

9.16.19  3:32 am   when do you think the holy bible 3 will come out

      as soon as you finish writing it

9.16.19  3:17 am   what is a bridge

      a device for walking on water

9.16.19  2:55 am   do you know how to write

      there are probably infinite ways to do it but yes

9.16.19  2:51 am   is it hard to answer all of these questions every day? 

      the easy ones are hard, and the hard ones are easy

9.16.19  2:06 am   name something that has a head

      a 102 headed monster

9.16.19  1:27 am   How to MIDI drum samples?

      it is vitally important to have an extremely well graded dynamic range, with a wide array of samples for every dynamic range

9.16.19  12:20 am   Do you think creating music serves to create purely musical beauty or does it serve aspects like emotion and storytelling outside of just pure music? 

      music can increase the potency of whatever it touches

9.16.19  12:15 am   why are you here

      to tell stories about there

9.15.19  11:56 pm   do you think "sad" songs make people sadder, or helps them unsad or neither/others?

      that depends if you have a sad song type a or b

9.15.19  11:42 pm   i'm starting to suspect that music and songs are even more important than i can even comprehend 

      they have an importance rating of 52

9.15.19  10:18 pm   BLT stands for many things, but what does it truly stand for?

      BLAAAAT

9.15.19  9:43 pm   how's the technological learning and upgrading process been going lately?

     good

      any tales from the trenches you feel like sharing?

      i have a superquit button that quits everything extremely quickly

9.15.19  9:39 pm   i suspect that there's musical codes baked directly into our dna  

      that may be true

9.15.19  9:24 pm   why do you keep making songs about me

      it's my job

9.15.19  9:21 pm   Why is salad

      to cover up the rest of the food, in shamefulness

9.15.19  9:18 pm   do you live in an alternate dimension if so which one? 

      i live in dimension 54s, which may or may not be the alternate one, depending on whether or not you live there

9.15.19  8:29 pm   im afraid of dying without having made a difference, but im afraid of making the wrong difference.. or actually going out to make one. Why am i afarid of so many things?

      that's because of how scary everything is

9.15.19  8:24 pm   is it fine that octohedrons look really tasty to me? 

      i am not one to judge

9.15.19  7:34 pm   are there any sounds common in music that you find irritating, and if so, what are they

      a lot of piano

9.15.19  7:14 pm   Are you doing a big project right now

      it's not so much a project, it's that i am increasing my ability to make projects

9.15.19  6:45 pm   what do you think is paul mccartney's greatest virtue

      to take the endposts which normally hold the '8 bar phrase' in position, and willfully move them around with glee and ease, and still attend to the day's pleasantries

9.15.19  6:32 pm   do you consider yourself brave?

      i have some degree of bravement

9.15.19  6:29 pm   why do people capitalize letters 

      for business, or pleasure

9.15.19  5:19 pm   How do I get into Caltech? Any tips?

      i have no idea

9.15.19  5:11 pm   how are you feeling about the new big project?

      it's not so much a project, it's that i am increasing my ability to make projects

9.15.19  3:43 pm   Is life a simulation?

      of what

9.15.19  3:29 pm   Why a lot of your work has the concept of "going back home"? 

      i don't know

9.15.19  3:18 pm   how can I become more motivated to do work

      what kind of work would you like to do, and why

9.15.19  2:26 pm   Why are the Flintstones more advanced than alot of the early civilizations?

      foreshadowing

9.15.19  2:25 pm   isn't it strange that no one's ever told the truth?

      that's exciting, that means you get to tell it for the first time

9.15.19  2:02 pm   whats your next big project

      learning to make projects

9.15.19  1:41 pm   What is a unique way that you use an instrument (in songs) that you haven't observed other artists doing much?

      use the electric bass sound to make a banjo instead

9.15.19  12:07 pm   Who should run for the president of Pluto?

      pluto has no elections. pluto already has a president, and that's pluto itself

9.15.19  11:12 am   favorite fruit?

      cube

9.15.19  10:14 am   Im getting into music production, what should I do?

      what have you done so far

9.15.19  8:34 am   do you put the bowl, cereal, milk or spoon first when making a bowl of cereal?

      there's no more cereal. all the cereal is gone, except for possibly on mars, which appears to be entirely cereal

9.15.19  8:16 am   Your bio needs to be more descriptive 

      i've chosen instead to make it expressive

9.15.19  5:36 am   do you find that when writing a song you have a series of lightning in a bottle moments,

     yes

      or would you say its different? Like do you maybe have one moment for the initial idea and then the rest is just pure work?

     lightning and work are usually both needed

9.15.19  3:04 am   what is a good percentage of consuming versus creating art in 1 lifetime?

      anywhere from 30:70 to 70:30

9.15.19  2:06 am  
Are you going to continue making videos on YouTube?

      i prefer to make them off youtube and then put them on youtube when it's done

9.15.19  1:24 am   9.14.19  8:48 pm You seem slightly averse to using the word "podcast" and typically seem to be in favor of using the term "talk show". Why is this?

      i don't know what it means. except i finally figured it out ........ it means show

9.15.19  1:16 am   you inspire me each and every day, so I have to ask you, what inspires you to keep going?

      the fabric and fibers of our world today

9.15.19  12:49 am   What do you regret most saying in a video of yours?

      i am contractually not allowed to have regrets

9.15.19  12:37 am   How do you find patience? 

      i will tell you a little bit later

9.15.19  12:18 am   i need to sleep. how?

      i'm not sure
